title: Error: 500 · Can't access PBE signup :(
body:
Every time I go to this link it shows image of Blitzcrank with text : 

" · Error: 500 ·
Something’s gone hextechnically wrong.
Maintenance golems are working to exterminate the problem. "

Do you know if site is down or I am not able to reach it? {{item:3151}}  https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup

replies.body: It looks like you're trying to sign up through the NA site, but your account is in EUNE.  You'll want to completely log out of the site, then go directly to the [EUNE League](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com) site.  After you login from there, access the[ EUNE PBE](https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) page.  Hope that helps!
I know this is an old post but I'm having the same problem even now. Im using a Mac if that is any help.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OQh4LUmW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-19T16:21:10.918+0000)
>
> It looks like you're trying to sign up through the NA site, but your account is in EUNE.  You'll want to completely log out of the site, then go directly to the [EUNE League](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com) site.  After you login from there, access the[ EUNE PBE](https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) page.  Hope that helps!

Well, im from NA and still i get this error from NA pbe page so there is an error on your site please fix it.
Thank you! I also tried to open it from different computers and browsers and still got same error :(
